summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: EMMOR Long Ombre Brown Wig for Women - 23 Inch Natural Synthetic Straight Hair Middle Part With Air Bang Wigs Dark Root, Party Cosplay Daily Use
Review Date: 2020/08/07
Store: EMMOR
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'EMMOR', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '13.5 x 9.72 x 2.2 inches; 11.68 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'femlc169-1'}
Review Text: nice color, nice texture, soft. comes with 2 nylon hair caps. great value for price.
Review Title: nice wig, great price.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: SELF/ish Men's Face Scrub | Exfoliating Facial Cleanser | Deep Cleansing | Effective Shave Prep & Beard Exfoliator for Men | Natural Ingredients | 3.4fl oz
Review Date: 2020/09/02
Store: MELARQT
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MELARQT', 'Item Form': 'Scrub', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.26 x 2.09 x 2.01 inches; 4.73 Ounces', 'Department': 'Men', 'UPC': '810042384002'}
Review Text: my fifteen year old has been using this (along with the daily facial cleanser) and it has helped clear the acne on his forehead. he gives it 5 stars!
Review Title: helps with teenage boy acne
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Empty Clear Glass Spray Bottles 2-PACK,Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist Settings
Review Date: 2020/09/09
Store: Cherry
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 6.5 x 3.4 inches; 1.4 Pounds', 'UPC': '791523234156'}
Review Text: nice spray bottles.... just remember...it's glass, so be careful!
Review Title: nice bottles!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Empty Brown Glass Spray Bottles2-Pack, Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist and Stream Settings
Review Date: 2020/09/09
Store: Cherry
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.46 x 3.35 inches; 4.94 Ounces', 'UPC': '791523234187'}
Review Text: nice set of spray bottles!! I used it to mix/dilute bleach and other chemical products that needed to be in new, unrecycled bottles. sprayer works fine, although one of them did leak when i turned the bottle upside down. not sure if that would happen with all the bottles, or just this one sprayer that i received. if you have other "plastic" spray bottles around your house, it will be easy to forget that this one is GLASS, so just be careful.
Review Title: nice set of glass bottles!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: No Brainer Gentle Facial Cleanser, 6 fl. oz, For Dry & Sensitive Skin, Leaves Skin Feeling Clean, Soft and Hydrated, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein & Amino Acids Restores Skin by Higher Education Skincare
Review Date: 2020/09/15
Store: Higher Education
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381030056'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:b3f95d0500123286d6c86e59790a77bd]] i appreciate a product that has a safety foil, so thumbs up for that! nice, clean scent, that reminds me of cucumbers. a thick, almost gel like consistency; doesn't lather very much, but still leaves face feeling fresh, clean, soft and smooth!
Review Title: nice scent, gentle cleanser
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz
Review Date: 2020/10/21
Store: Bouquet Garni
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:5a1f001511c47e51512c7544aeef60f4]] if you like a musky scent, then this soap is for you. it lathers well (see video) and has a somewhat strong musk scent; not overly strong, but definitely not light. did not dry out my skin. packaged well in a box; pump has a safety guard that doesn't allow the pump to be pressed until it's removed.
Review Title: lathers well
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Spray Bottle with Adjustable Nozzle, Suream 10.6oz/300ml Green Mist Sprayer with Stream for Curly Hair, Refillable Empty Plastic Bottle for Hairdressing, Planting, Ironing and Cleaning
Review Date: 2020/11/12
Store: SUREAM
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 4.49 x 3.07 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '735632989217'}
Review Text: made of durable, strong plastic; not flimsy or squeezable like cheaper plastic bottles..nice size and shape. twist open/close spray nozzle. good height, so won’t topple over, even when empty.
Review Title: durable plastic, nice color.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Pet Tear Stain Remover Comb, 8 Pcs Double-Sided Dog Eye Comb Brush, Double Head Grooming Comb, Multipurpose Tool for Small Pet Cat Dogs Crust and Mucus Removal (Silver & Black)
Review Date: 2021/03/31
Store: LBSXQGS
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Brand': 'LBSXQGS', 'Hair Type': 'Thick', 'Color': 'Silver', 'Size': 'Small', 'Package Dimensions': '9.76 x 6.89 x 0.35 inches; 4.94 Ounces', 'UPC': '805110051801'}
Review Text: I tried to use these on my 6lb maltipoo, but she squirmed too much and I was so afraid of poking her eyes with it.  I used the brush side on her, but it didn't help as much as the puppy comb I use on her regularly. however... these work great for ME!! love it to brush my eyebrows and separate any makeup clumps in my lashes!  not sure what the purpose is of selling these in a pack of 8, except to share and have spare ones everywhere.
Review Title: more safe and useful on human than dog
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BEPHOLAN Natural Eyelash Growth Serum and Brow Enhancer to Grow Thicker, Longer Lashes for Long, Luscious Lashes and Eyebrows|10ML
Review Date: 2021/05/13
Store: BEPHOLAN
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.94 x 1.18 x 1.06 inches; 0.88 Ounces'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:ab1f3554604ea2e327f24928218d64e1]] I used this for over a month before posting this review. my lashes had no improvement after using this serum. I liked that there was a lot of serum in the small bottle (other serums I've tried always seems like there's not much serum in the bottle), however, a lot of serum gets wasted on the wand because the bottle hole doesn't help to keep any excess inside (see my video for better explanation). still, the bottom line is that this didn't work for me.
Review Title: no improvement for me
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: NVTED 2 PCS Pet Bath Brush, 2 in 1 Dog Cat Double-Sided Massage Grooming Sponge Bath Shampoo Brushes Soft Silicone Bristles Give Pet Gentle Massage
Review Date: 2021/08/09
Store: NVTED
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'NVTED', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Bristle Material': 'Silicone', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '8.58 x 6.97 x 2.36 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '711796999392'}
Review Text: we use both brushes to bathe two different breeds, one on a maltese/shitzu and the other on a short haired terrier mix. they both work great and help with the scrubbing. much more effective than just using your hands. the silicone is soft and not rough on their skin. seems very durable and i expect it will last a long time. easy to hold.
Review Title: great brushes for dog bath
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: COLORGRAM Artist Formula Auto Brow Pencil 0.25g- True Beauty K-Drama Makeup, Built-in-Spoolie, Clump-Free Formula, Softly Glides, Natural Look (05 Gray Brown)
Review Date: 2021/09/25
Store: COLORGRAM
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'COLORGRAM', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening'}
Review Text: i have very dark brows, but black colored pencils just looks too harsh on me. this gray brown color is a perfect match, to fill in the sparse areas of my brows.  the pencil shape is not a pointy tip, so it’s not really for precision penciling, but more for “filling in”.  i prefer a natural look, so this works great for my needs.  it’s a twist pencil (no sharpening), and you get about 1” of pencil in the tube.
Review Title: perfect color match; natural looking
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ROSEGEMM Birthday Gifts For Women- Your Best Friend, Sister, Mom, Wife, Or Any Female! Give A Gift That Shows You Care! Unique Package For Self Care, Relaxing For Her Special Bday! Cute For Any Woman!
Review Date: 2022/05/12
Store: ROSEGEMM
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ROSEGEMM', 'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Number of Items': '5', 'Package Dimensions': '7.68 x 7.68 x 4.06 inches; 2.25 Pounds', 'Department': 'womens', 'UPC': '628678717022'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:d9b745d7c2810ac319e3bd7f10de25e6]] it's a cute boxed set with various items ranging from bath bombs, to a necklace, to a wine tumbler. if you don't have time or thought to get a special gift, then this a decent backup. Not sure if all the items are worth $49, but again, if you need it quick and don't want to put much thought into a personal gift, then this is for you. the rose gold necklace is pretty, and I like that the tumbler is blank with no branding or decorations on it. the bath bombs are mediocre and the candle and body scrub have a light vanilla scent to them. the gift box itself is nice and well packaged. definitely giftable.
Review Title: nice gift set with various items
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

I liked that there was a lot of serum in the small bottle (other serums I've tried always seems like there's not much serum in the bottle), however, a lot of serum gets wasted on the wand because the bottle hole doesn't help to keep any excess inside (see my video for better explanation). still, the bottom line is that this didn't work for me.
Review Title: no improvement for me
Rating: 1.0

Review Text: we use both brushes to bathe two different breeds, one on a maltese/shitzu and the other on a short haired terrier mix. they both work great and help with the scrubbing. much more effective than just using your hands. the silicone is soft and not rough on their skin. seems very durable and i expect it will last a long time. easy to hold.

Product Title: COLORGRAM Artist Formula Auto Brow Pencil 0.25g- True Beauty K-Drama Makeup, Built-in-Spoolie, Clump-Free Formula, Softly Glides, Natural Look (05 Gray Brown)
Review Date: 2021/09/25
Store: COLORGRAM
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'COLORGRAM', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening'}
Review Text: i have very dark brows, but black colored pencils just looks too harsh on me. this gray brown color is a perfect match, to fill in the sparse areas of my brows.  the pencil shape is not a pointy tip, so it’s not really for precision penciling, but more for “filling in”.  i prefer a natural look, so this works great for my needs.  it’s a twist pencil (no sharpening), and you get about 1” of pencil in the tube.
Review Title: perfect color match; natural looking
Rating: 5.0

Review Text: [[VIDEOID:d9b745d7c2810ac319e3bd7f10de25e6]] it's a cute boxed set with various items ranging from bath bombs, to a necklace, to a wine tumbler. if you don't have time or thought to get a special gift, then this a decent backup. Not sure if all the items are worth $49, but again, if you need it quick and don't want to put much thought into a personal gift, then this is for you. the rose gold necklace is pretty, and I like that the tumbler is blank with no branding or decorations on it. the bath bombs are mediocre and the candle and body scrub have a light vanilla scent to them. the gift box itself is nice and well packaged. definitely giftable.
Review Title: nice gift set with various items
Rating: 4.0

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's purchase history highlights a preference for quality personal care and grooming products, demonstrating a consistent positive sentiment towards items that emphasize natural ingredients and effective results. Reviews frequently mention satisfaction with the aesthetic aspects such as color, texture, and scent, indicating a preference for visually appealing and sensory-rich products. 

Common themes include practicality, as seen in the selection of both beauty and functional items, suggesting this person values multi-use products that enhance daily routines. The buyer's engagement with both personal care items and cleaning supplies indicates a strong interest in maintaining both self-care and home environments.

Quality is a recurrent factor, with higher ratings for products like gentle cleansers and durable spray bottles overshadowing items perceived as lower-performing. Price sensitivity appears balanced; while the person appreciates good value for money, they may prioritize quality over cost, especially regarding personal care products.

Overall, the core preferences center around products that provide effective results, are aesthetically pleasing, utilize natural ingredients, and offer versatility in use, revealing a thoughtful and practical approach to shopping.

target_interaction.text: [[VIDEOID:3374f8248a4d50ea0b36f2f53972ccc1]] the guitar is a small, plastic blow up, but the wig, shirt and hat are good quality. the wig hair is a bit wild and will need some brushing or even a cut to really make it look like wayne’s (i think it’s longer than wayne’s hair). it’s a good value for an easy halloween costume. could also be used to dress up as a rock and roll guitarist just by switching out the hat.
